attributes.action: The Government should refuse all attempts to force a second EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The petition can be found at petition.parliament.uk
attributes.background: Attempts are being made by the "Remain" campaign to continue their fight against the UK's divorce from the EU. To do this they are using the UK Government's website to force the Houses of Parliament to discuss a second Referendum. We believe this to be an abuse, and an insult to the British people.
